channel.title: Kakfa on Ed-M.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Kakfa on Ed-M.dev

item.description: 220726 Okay I’ve been working the saga pattern. It took me a while of paper and thinking to figure it out. I have the concept worked out. Looking at it now it seems simple, but it took me a lot of big thinking to figure it out.

220718 _0523 Okay I’ve been do throwing this idea around in my head after getting that reader to work last week. I don’t think I need a Kafka just to use cross service just to send REST request between services.

220601 Getting Kafka to some operational state So I got the KRaft to work I think, then I realized I really didn’t understand all that much about Kafka and using the new stuff leaves documentation rather low, but whatever.
